name: dad! where are we going
description:
Dad, Where Are We Going, we play the game now ！
Very cute kids in TV show extremely popular in china come the game now
play with kimi and sandy

As a casual elimination game, the game play is simple and easy to play, boys and girls are playing, quickly download it! Your little partner in your score, etc. Oh.

Easy to play
How to play: Click on 2 boxes of the same color in one box can be removed quickly eliminate complete batter Oh, get the highest score within a minute of it!
